title: Beware of fake Trump post telling Trans-Siberian Orchestra to 'figure out' its gender
description: In late 2025, U.S President Donald Trump wrote in a Truth Social post that the "Trans Siberian Orchestra has exactly 24 days to figure out if they are male or female Siberian orchestra."
content: In late December 2025, a screenshot (archived) circulated online purportedly showing that U.S. President Donald Trump wrote on Truth Social that the "Trans Siberian Orchestra has exactly 24 days to f… [+4342 chars]
